    • setGui

      public void setGui(GUI gui)
      Sets the GUI for the message handler.
      Specified by:
      setGui in interface Controller
      Parameters:
      gui - The GUI to be set.

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the message handler. This method sets up the necessary components and configurations for the message handler. It adjusts the size of the background and root elements based on the screen size. It also initializes various lists and objects used in the message handler. Additionally, it sets the chat box and clears the hand. Finally, it initializes the living room grid, bookshelf grid, and select column.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface Controller

    • initPlayerList

      public void initPlayerList(ArrayList<Player> players)
      Initializes the player list in the GUI. This method creates the visual representation of the player list in the GUI based on the provided list of players. It sets the player names, styles, and event handlers for interacting with the player bookshelves.
      Parameters:
      players - The list of players

    • setHand

      public void setHand(ArrayList<ItemTile> hand)
      Sets the images of the tiles in the hand based on the given list of ItemTile objects.
      Parameters:
      hand - The list of ItemTile objects representing the tiles in the hand.

    • setBoard

      public void setBoard(Square[][] board, int maxNumItems)
      Sets the board state and displays the items on the living room grid.
      Parameters:
      board - The 2D array representing the board state.
      maxNumItems - The maximum number of items allowed on the board.

    • clearEffects

      public void clearEffects()
      Clears any visual effects applied to the item cells in the living room grid.

    • clearTiles

      public void clearTiles()
      Clears the lists of tiles to be inserted and drawn.

    • setPersonalGoalCardImage

      public void setPersonalGoalCardImage()
      Sets the image of the personal goal card for the player. The image is determined based on the player's personal goal card identifier.

    • setCommonGoals

      public void setCommonGoals(ArrayList<CommonGoalCard> commonGoals)
      Sets the images for the common goal cards. The images are determined based on the provided common goal cards.
      Parameters:
      commonGoals - The list of common goal cards.

    • setPlayerQueue

      public void setPlayerQueue(ArrayList<Player> players)

    • setPlayers

      public void setPlayers(ArrayList<Player> players)

    • setChat

      public void setChat(ChatMessage message)
      Adds a chat message to the chat flow. The chat message is displayed with the sender's username and content. Private messages are indicated with a "(PRIVATE MESSAGE)" prefix.
      Parameters:
      message - The chat message to add to the chat flow.

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage(String message, String recipientusername)
      Sends a chat message with the given content to the specified recipient. If a recipient username is provided, the message is sent as a private message.
      Parameters:
      message - The content of the message to send.
      recipientusername - The username of the message recipient, or null if it's a public message.

    • setIcons

      public void setIcons(String username, int commonGoal, CommonGoalCard cg)
      Sets the icons for the common goal based on the given parameters. Determines the URL of the image based on the value of `cg.peek()`. If `commonGoal` is 1, sets the image for the first common goal score box. If `commonGoal` is 2, sets the image for the second common goal score box. The icons for players are set based on their username.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the player.
      commonGoal - The common goal number (1 or 2).
      cg - The CommonGoalCard object to get the scoring token value from.

    • destroy

      public void destroy()
      Clears the images in the item living room cells and bookshelf cells. Used to destroy/reset the state of the board.

    • setDrawn

      public void setDrawn(boolean drawn)
      Sets the value of the 'drawn' flag.
      Parameters:
      drawn - The value to set for the 'drawn' flag.

    • setLastTurnIcon

      public void setLastTurnIcon(String currentPlayer)
